findings.title: Abuse of authority
findings.description: The burn() function can be called by burnContracts to burn token amounts from any address, and the owner has excessive privileges including changing fees, adding/removing whitelisted/burnContracts addresses, and pausing/unpausing contracts.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function addBurnContracts(), addWhiteList() uses a loop to iterate through addresses list and may abort with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long addresses list.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.
